mapper.select: SELECT FCLT_MGMT_NO ,FCLT_NM ,FCLT_EXPL ,STTN ,FCLT_LOC ,FCLT_STTS_CD ,NFC_TAG_ID ,REG_DTT ,UPD_DTT ,REG_ID ,UPD_ID FROM TB_FCLT WHERE FCLT_MGMT_NO = #{FCLT_MGMT_NO}

SELECT F.FCLT_MGMT_NO ,F.FCLT_NM ,F.FCLT_EXPL ,F.STTN ,F.FCLT_LOC ,F.FCLT_STTS_CD ,F.NFC_TAG_ID ,F.REG_DTT ,F.UPD_DTT ,F.REG_ID ,F.UPD_ID ,E.EQPM_NO ,E.FCLT_MGMT_NO ,E.EQPM_NM ,E.EQPM_IP ,E.EQPM_STTS_CD ,E.MDL_NM ,E.EQPM_EXPL ,E.MFTR ,E.NFC_TAG_ID ,E.EQPM_SPC ,E.EQPM_MAC ,E.EQPM_MEMO ,E.EQPM_TP ,E.EQPM_OS FROM TB_FCLT F LEFT JOIN TB_EQPM E on E.FCLT_MGMT_NO = F.FCLT_MGMT_NO WHERE F.FCLT_MGMT_NO = #{FCLT_MGMT_NO}

SELECT F.FCLT_NM ,F.FCLT_MGMT_NO ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FCLT_RSRV R INNER JOIN TB_FCLT_RSRV_DT D ON (R.RSRV_NO = D.RSRV_NO) WHERE F.FCLT_MGMT_NO = R.FCLT_MGMT_NO AND D.RSRV_DT >= CURDATE() AND D.RSRV_DT < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%p') = 'AM' AND D.TZ_TP_CD = 'R01001' OR DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%p') = 'PM' AND D.TZ_TP_CD = 'R01002')) AS FCLT_CHKIN_CNT ,E.EQPM_NO ,E.EQPM_NM ,E.EQPM_STTS_CD ,CASE EQPM_PWR_STTS_CD WHEN 'E05001' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EQPM_STTS_HIST H WHERE H.EQPM_NO = E.EQPM_NO AND H.GTH_DTT >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -10 MINUTE)) WHEN 'E05002' THEN 1 WHEN 'E05003' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END AS EQPM_ALV_CNT FROM TB_FCLT F LEFT JOIN TB_EQPM E ON F.FCLT_MGMT_NO = E.FCLT_MGMT_NO ORDER BY F.FCLT_MGMT_NO

SELECT F.FCLT_MGMT_NO ,F.FCLT_NM ,F.FCLT_EXPL ,F.STTN ,F.FCLT_LOC ,F.FCLT_STTS_CD ,F.NFC_TAG_ID ,F.REG_DTT ,F.UPD_DTT ,F.REG_ID ,F.UPD_ID ,H.VST_DTT ,U.USR_EML ,E.ENTP_NM ,C.CHK_CNTT FROM TB_FCLT F INNER JOIN TB_FCLT_RSRV R on R.FCLT_MGMT_NO = F.FCLT_MGMT_NO INNER JOIN TB_FCLT_RSRV_DT D on R.RSRV_NO = D.RSRV_NO INNER JOIN TB_USR U on R.USR_NO = U.USR_NO INNER JOIN TB_ENTP E on E.ENTP_NO = U.ENTP_NO LEFT JOIN TB_FCLT_VST_HIST H on D.RSRV_NO = H.RSRV_NO AND D.RSRV_DTL_NO = H.RSRV_DTL_NO LEFT JOIN TB_FCLT_CHK C on F.FCLT_MGMT_NO = C.FCLT_MGMT_NO AND H.VST_NO = C.VST_NO WHERE F.FCLT_MGMT_NO = #{FCLT_MGMT_NO}

SELECT count( F.FCLT_MGMT_NO)
FROM TB_FCLT F INNER JOIN TB_FCLT_CHK C on C.FCLT_MGMT_NO = F.FCLT_MGMT_NO INNER JOIN TB_FCLT_VST_HIST H on H.VST_NO = C.VST_NO INNER JOIN TB_FCLT_RSRV_DT D on H.RSRV_DTL_NO = D.RSRV_DTL_NO INNER JOIN TB_FCLT_RSRV R on R.RSRV_NO = D.RSRV_NO INNER JOIN TB_USR U on U.USR_NO = R.USR_NO INNER JOIN TB_ENTP E on E.ENTP_NO = U.ENTP_NO WHERE F.FCLT_MGMT_NO = #{FCLT_MGMT_NO}
